tool.name: Import Traits
tool.description: Import and process ecological characteristics file of the MTBLS520 study.
tool.help:
========================= Eco-Metabolomics workflow =========================
This is the computational workflow to study the seasonal variation of secondary metabolites in nine different bryophytes.
Module | Ecological characteristics |
Description | Import and process ecological characteristics file |
----- Input -----
Input Preprocess Rdata | Rdata file from one of the modules peak picking or import MAF |
Input ecological characteristics | CSV file containing the ecological characteristics (traits) |
------ Output ------
Preprocess Rdata file | Please connect this Rdata file to the species diversity module of the MTBLS520 workflow |
---------------------------------------------------
